name: is_core_rule.json
description: Determines whether a given rule meets the criteria for inclusion in the core rule set based on core_rule.json.

rule.description: A complete rule object conforming to rule.json structure.

is_core.description: True if the rule qualifies for core based on core_rule.json.

reason.description: Optional explanation for why the rule did or did not qualify.

failures.description: Optional list of specific eligibility criteria not met.

notes: This prompt is used in rule validation workflows to determine whether a rule should be treated as a core rule or a composable rule.
